description: This table contains the CRC Condition indicator information for professional billing transaction.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CRC_CONDITION_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the CRC condition indicator.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


L1 - General Standard of 20 Degree or .5 Diopter Sphere or Cylinder Change Met


L2 - Replacement Due to Loss or Theft


L3 - Replacement Due to Breakage or Damage


L4 - Replacement Due to Patient Preference


L5 - Replacement Due to Medical Reason
